0.1.name: wordpress/woocommerce-custom-product-tabs-lite
0.1.description:
This plugin extends the WooCommerce e-commerce plugin by allowing a custom product tab to be added to product view pages with arbitrary content, which may contain text, html or shortcodes.

The custom tab, if defined, will appear in between the 'additional information' and 'reviews' tabs.

To easily add multiple tabs, share tabs between products, and more features, consider upgrading to the premium Tab Manager

Plugin/Theme Support

This plugin should be compatible with any WooCommerce theme and has been tested with the following

  • Theme: "Wootique" (free, by WooThemes)
  • Theme: "Woostore" (thanks to Dusan Belescak)

Feedback

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback - Thank you
